posts.post_content:
Urza's block - even after all these years, Wizards *still* had no idea what it was doing.
  
   
First turn - Forest, Llanowar Elves. Alright... that's not too bad.
  
   
Second turn - Tap both for Priest of Titania; play Gaea's Cradle, tap for Rofellos. Hrmmm....
  
   
Third turn - A second forest means access to 11 mana. *Wait, what?*   
   
What are you even going to do with that much mana? Play a Joraga Warcaller with 5 kickers? Follow up with an Immaculate Magistrate and a couple Imperious Perfects? Having fun yet?
posts.html:
Urza's block - even after all these years, Wizards still had no idea what it was doing.

First turn - Forest, Llanowar Elves. Alright... that's not too bad.

Second turn - Tap both for Priest of Titania; play Gaea's Cradle, tap for Rofellos. Hrmmm....

Third turn - A second forest means access to 11 mana. Wait, what?

What are you even going to do with that much mana? Play a Joraga Warcaller with 5 kickers? Follow up with an Immaculate Magistrate and a couple Imperious Perfects? Having fun yet?

posts.post_content:
@Nate\_Prawdzik: Why stop at just a third-turn [Emrakul, the Aeons Torn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Emrakul, the Aeons Torn)?  
  
T1: Play [Forest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Forest), cast [Exploration](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Exploration), play another [Forest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Forest), cast [Concordant Crossroads](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Concordant Crossroads). (Cards remaining = 3)  
T2: Draw a card for the turn, play 2x [Forest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Forest), cast [Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=15237) and tap it for ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol), cast [Primeval Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Primeval Titan) (for 2x [Wirewood Lodge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wirewood Lodge)) ***and attack with it (for another 2x [Wirewood Lodge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wirewood Lodge))***.
